definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
layer filled with rammed earth in a tomb pit (archeology)

sentences.english: The unsaturated irrigation supply has duality in yellow soil.
sentences.chinese: 集中的灌溉补给，在黄土层中形成二元非饱和渗流。

sentences.english: An archaeologically valuable ancient tomb was unearthed in the underlying soil of this corn field.
sentences.chinese: 这片玉米地下伏土层中出土了一个有考古价值的古墓。

sentences.english: In parts of Saint Emilion the gravel lies on limestone base.
sentences.chinese: 部分圣爱米浓产区砂砾层都平铺于石灰石土层上。

sentences.english: Were parasitized larvae overwinter in the frozen soil layer below, known as winter worm.
sentences.chinese: 被寄生的幼虫在冻土层以下越冬，称为冬虫。

sentences.english: Soft thick sediments will amplify the shaking, and hard rock will not.
sentences.chinese: 软且厚的土层会放大振动，而坚硬的岩石则不会。

sentences.english: The presence of sea ice and of permafrost helps protect Arctic barrier islands for much of the year.
sentences.chinese: 海冰和冻土层的出现很多年来帮助保护了北极障壁岛。

sentences.english: The weight of roots increased in deep soil layer with treatment of non-irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 重肥处理根系入土深，深土层根量增加。

sentences.english: These soils are well developed and contain a subsurface horizon in which clays have accumulated.
sentences.chinese: 发育良好，土表下有一层粘土淀积土层。

sentences.english: The theoretical basis for reinforcing of dynamic compaction in winter and treating the frozen soil layer is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了关于冬季强夯加固处理冻土层的理论依据。

sentences.english: The lithologic substratum is made of gravel, sand and clay with a layer of loess.
sentences.chinese: 岩性底层是由砾石，沙质土，粘土与黄土层组成。

sentences.english: In different stratification of same stage, the number of seeds is nearly the same.
sentences.chinese: 同一阶段各土层种子数差异不大。

sentences.english: Longkou power plant, Shandong province is located in an area of soft sandy clay layer liable to liquification.
sentences.chinese: 龙口电厂建于山东省可液化的软土层地基上。

sentences.english: Granite with manganese. Porous top layer provides good drainage.
sentences.chinese: 含锰的花岗岩土层，表层多孔使排水性良好。

sentences.english: Multi-layer thin high mountain stone, planted wheat bun to eat.
sentences.chinese: 山高石多土层薄，种上麦子吃不上馍。

sentences.english: There is 5, 000 miles of railway track built on permafrost.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯有5000英里的铁路线修筑在永久冻土层上。

sentences.english: Xiashu Loess is a kind of geographical special soil in Zhenjiang area.
sentences.chinese: 下蜀黄土是镇江地区广泛分布的一种特殊性土层。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
